title.rendered: Surgical instruments, suture material, other medical supplies delivered to Oleksandrivsky hospital in Kyiv (video)

content.rendered:
Surgical instruments, suture material, and a variety of other essential medical supplies have been delivered to Oleksandrivsky clinical hospital in Kyiv.
Highly skilled doctors in the Oleksandrivsky hospital provide quality health care not only to Kyiv residents but also to people who were forced to leave their homes in the Donbas region. Doctors are extremely grateful for this bounty of medical supplies.
Special thanks to Tetyana Neeley​, Brother’s Brother Foundation, and to Boris Penchuk​ for delivery and this special report.
